index

class PrintDriver

Revision History

General information:

Author: klaas holwerda

Version: 1.0

Date: Thu Oct 14 13:41:36 MET 1999

  • scrndrv.h

  • gdsii.h
  • mainwin.h

Code files:

  • printer.cpp

Description:

    low level drawing function for primitives to draw to the printer it is derived from wxPrintout as well as the drawdriver. And therefore the mediator between the internal database and the printer device see for more info related types.

Inherited from:

  • wxPrintout (class) (public, standard)
  • DrawDriver (class) (public, standard)
